title: The Time of My Life
description: Derious Cooper is an African American teenager on the fringes of gang activity. Evan Jones is a wealthy white doctor and former Olympic runner who has been injured and lost the ability to run. When Evan coaches a track team on which Derious is the star runner, they discover that they are connected by more than the love of running. Time Of My Life is about overcoming adversity, breaking racial barriers and making a difference in the loves of others.
author: Lynn  Murphy
